name: Keyboard Hurdles
description:
!! WARNING !! This game may potentially break your keyboard

Hurdling sports with only 3 buttons. Finish as fast as possible.

Control :

  • Run (press repeatedly) :  
    • Player 1 : Q & W
    • Player 2 : O & P
  • Jump : 
    • Player 1 : E
    • Player 2 : I

A game made for Weekly Game Jam 151 with Olympic Games as the theme.
